Name: Empowering People in Rights Enforcement (EMPIRE) Worker Protection Act. (S.448/A.4278)
Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.448/A.4278, in relation to enacting the Empowering People in Rights Enforcement (EMPIRE) Worker Protection Act
BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
